fields.name: Flower of Eden (C1)
fields.value: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

fields.name: Opening of Phanerozoic (C2)
fields.value:
Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:

Each stack of Fatal Reckoning increases DMG by of Albedo's DEF.
The effect stacks up to 4 times.

Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning, increasing the DMG dealt by the Tectonic Tide and Fatal Blossoms based on the number of stacks consumed.

fields.name: Grace of Helios (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the level of Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Descent of Divinity (C4)
fields.value: Solar Isotoma increases Plunging Attack DMG by 30% for active party members within the AoE.

fields.name: Tide of Hadaen (C5)
fields.value:
Increases the level of Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Dust of Purification (C6)
fields.value: If active party members within the AoE are protected by a shield created by Crystallize, Solar Isotoma increases their DMG by 17%.

description: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.
title: Albedo
